description: From the Publisher Download the free app! A personalised digital revision planner with quick tests to check your understanding Question styles similar to those you will meet in the exam Work through lots of practice questions written specifically for the GCSE 9-1 specifications Challenge yourself with questions designed to get you better grades Develop excellent exam technique with exam tips and support to help you when the going gets tough GCSE 9-1 Physics Revision and Exam Practice All you need to prepare for your GCSE Physics exams The GCSE 9-1: Physics series has been designed by experienced teachers and Physics experts to support the development of excellent exam technique and help you achieve the top marks! Broken down by topic, the Revision Guides are packed with tools to study on the go, meaning you can prepare with confidence no matter your revision style! The Exam Practice Books include questions, as well as at least one complete practice paper, to really consolidate learning! Up to date Revision Guides and Exam Practice Books, fully matched to the exam specifications Boost skills and confidence with engaging, colourful and challenging content A free app to help revision on the go Practice questions written by experts and step-by-step support Each Revision Guide is based on our ‘active’ approach to revision – tips and tricks to help the knowledge really sink in!
